mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT e.empl_no, e.empl_nm, d.dept_name, t.team_name as teamCode, ( SELECT c.cc_name FROM common_code c WHERE c.cg_group = 'POSITION' AND c.cc_code = e.empl_position FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) AS emplPosition, e.empl_email, e.empl_telno, ( SELECT c.cc_name FROM common_code c WHERE c.cg_group = 'DCLZ_TYPE' AND c.cc_code = ( SELECT dl.dclz_type FROM diligence_and_laziness dl WHERE dl.empl_no = e.empl_no ORDER BY dl.dclz_no DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) AS emplPwd FROM employee e JOIN team t ON e.team_code = t.team_code JOIN department d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE d.dept_code = #{deptCode}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT notice_no as board_no , notice_writer as board_writer , notice_title as board_title , notice_content as board_content , notice_date as board_date , notice_udate as board_udate , notice_hit as board_hit , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(notice_no) DESC) row_num FROM notice ) a WHERE a.row_num <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT board_no , board_writer , board_title , board_content , board_date , board_udate , board_anon , board_hit , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(board_no) DESC) row_num FROM board ) a WHERE a.row_num <= 5
SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(doc_no) from DOCUMENT where writer_no = #{emplNo} and doc_apv = '01' ) as doc FROM dual

SELECT sch_no ,empl_no ,sch_title ,TO_CHAR(sch_sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS sch_sdate ,TO_CHAR(sch_edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS sch_edate ,sch_allday ,sch_color ,sch_textcolor FROM schedule WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo} AND TRUNC(sch_sdate) = TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
